metadata.Title: CVE-2016-4074 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
The jv_dump_term function in jq 1.5 allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (stack consumption and application crash) via a craftedJSON file. This issue has been fixed in jq 1.6_rc1-r0.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-4074` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

jq - 1.5+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1+esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: jq package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.5+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1+esm2').
